findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function does not have any access control or validation, allowing unauthorized users to approve arbitrary tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function lacks protection, allowing unauthorized access and potential exploitation.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The owner can mint tokens after initial contract creation/deployment.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The burn function does not have any access control, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the contract's tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swapTokensForDividendToken and swapAndSendnutgDividends functions are private but unprotected, allowing unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The skim function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of sensitive data.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The sync function does not have any protection mechanism which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The initialize function is unprotected, allowing anyone to call it and potentially alter the contract's state.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function does not have any protection or access control, allowing unauthorized users to increase allowance.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function is unprotected and can be exploited to mint tokens without authorization.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker to drain the contract's tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is unprotected and can be exploited by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Unprotected _setupDecimals function
findings.description: The _setupDecimals function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or modification.

findings.title: Unprotected _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The _beforeTokenTransfer function is unprotected and can be accessed internally without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawDividend function
findings.description: The withdrawablenutgDividendOf function does not have any access modifiers or restrictions, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access and potential manipulation of dividend distributions.
